content.html: To all the press reaching out in my DMs: No, I will not speculate on distributed systems failure modes for you, for two reasons: 1. There are many highly qualified, publicly available people you can, and should reach out to. 2. I am a 20-sided die on a hellsite.
content.value:
To all the press reaching out in my DMs:

No, I will not speculate on distributed systems failure modes for you, for two reasons:

1. There are many highly qualified, publicly available people you can, and should reach out to.

2. I am a 20-sided die on a hellsite.
